title: Microphone not working properly not even on third-party apps. But works properly while on Speaker
content:
Whenever I receive any call on my number or even on any third-party app i have to turn my speaker mode on, to attend my call because without turning speaker mode on my microphone doesn't work properly. The next person hears very very low sound. While talking on speaker mode it works properly.
Using Pixel XL and it was not any issue since the 2nd last update
